title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practice Competencies: Sustainable Resource Management Decision-Making Capability Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply three core principles of sustainable resource management in practice.
Learners can make resource allocation decisions using decision-making frameworks (cost-benefit analysis, stakeholder mapping).
Learners can write decision-making reports reflecting sustainability indicators by analyzing real-world cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
